item.content:encoded:
ã¾ãšã¯å …å®Ÿã«å®šç•ªRDBã‹ã‚‰

ã€€NoSQLãƒ–ãƒ¼ãƒ ã§å‹‰å¼·ä¼šç•Œéšˆã§ã¯å½±ãŒè–„ã‚ŒãŸæ„ŸãŒã‚ã‚‹RDBMSã§ã™ãŒã€å½“ãŸã‚Šå‰ã®å­˜åœ¨ã«ãªã£ãŸã ã‘ã§å¥åœ¨ã§ã™ã€‚å½“ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆãŒä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹CMSã€WordPressã€ã«ã¯MySQLãŒçµ„ã¿è¾¼ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã—ã€å½“ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’ç½®ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹AWSã§ã‚‚PostgreSQLãŒRedShiftã‚„Auroraãªã©åŸºå¹¹ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã§ä½¿ã‚ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã€€çµ±è¨ˆãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã‚’çŸ¥ã‚‰ãªã„ã®ã«ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ‹ãƒ³ã‚°ã§ã‚¤ã‚­ã‚‹äººãŒä¿¡ç”¨å‡ºæ¥ãªã„ã®ã¨åŒæ§˜ã€RDBMSã‚’çŸ¥ã‚‰ãªã„ã®ã«NoSQLã‚’èªã‚‹ã®ã‚‚ã‚¤ã‚¿ã„äººã§ã™ã€‚ç§ã‚‚æ˜¨å¹´ã¯Elasticsearchãªã©ã®NoSQLã‚„Apache Igniteãªã©ã®åˆ†æ•£ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«ãƒãƒã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸãŒã€è‡ªåˆ†ã®ã‚¤ã‚¿ã•ã«æ°—ã¥ã„ãŸãŸã‚PostgreSQLã‚’å­¦ã³ç›´ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã€€NoSQLã‚„åˆ†æ•£ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’æ¥­å‹™ã§ä½¿ã„ã“ãªã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹æ–¹ã€…ã®è¬›æ¼”ã¯å‹‰å¼·ä¼šã§èãã“ã¨ãŒå‡ºæ¥ã¾ã™ãŒã€å½¼ã‚‰ã¯ã€ŒRDBMSã‚’çµŒé¨“ã—ãŸä¸Šã§NoSQLã«é€²ã‚“ã§ã„ã‚‹ã€ã®ã§ã™ã€‚æœªçµŒé¨“è€…ãŒè¬›æ¼”ã‚’èã„ã¦ã„ããªã‚ŠNoSQLã«è¡Œãã®ã¯ã€æ‚ªæ‰‹ã€ã§ã™ã€‚

åˆå¿ƒè€…ãŒNoSQLã‚„åˆ†æ•£RDBã§ã‚„ã‚ŠãŸã„ã“ã¨ã¯PostgreSQLã§ã‚‚å‡ºæ¥ã¦ã„ã‚‹

ã€€NoSQLãŒä¸»ã«æ‰±ã†JSONã¯PosgreSQLã§ã‚‚ã€JSONå‹ã€ã¨ã—ã¦æ‰±ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚IMDBã§è©±é¡Œã¨ãªã£ãŸã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªå‡¦ç†ã¯PostgreSQLã§ã‚‚é§†ä½¿ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚åˆ†æ•£ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã®ç‰¹å¾´ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã®ä¸¦åˆ—å‡¦ç†ã¯PostgreSQLã§ã‚‚ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¬ãƒ«ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã¨ã—ã¦å®Ÿè£…ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ä¸Šã€ç‰¹åˆ¥ã®è¨­å®šç„¡ã—ã§è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«ä½¿ã£ã¦ãã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

ã€€æ˜¨å¹´ã€å®Ÿéš›ã«Apage Igniteã§PCã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ5å°ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚’æ§‹ç¯‰ã—ã¾ã—ãŸãŒã€æ•°10GBç¨‹åº¦ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§ã¯ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã«è¦ã™ã‚‹æ™‚é–“ãŒã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®PostgreSQLã®æ–¹ãŒé€Ÿã‹ã£ãŸã§ã™ã€‚2.5GbEã§ã‚‚LANã®é…å»¶ã§ä¸¦åˆ—å‡¦ç†ã®ãƒ¡ãƒªãƒƒãƒˆãŒç›¸æ®ºã•ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®è¦æ¨¡ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã‚’é«˜é€ŸåŒ–ã™ã‚‹ãªã‚‰ã€32ã‚³ã‚¢64ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã®ãƒ‘ã‚½ã‚³ãƒ³ã§ã‚‚è²·ãˆã°è‰¯ã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã€€ã“ã†ã„ã†äº‹å®Ÿã¯ã€åŸºæœ¬çš„ã™ãã¦å‹‰å¼·ä¼šã§ã¯ãªã‹ãªã‹æ•™ãˆã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆãªã„ã§ã™ã­ã€‚ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ‹ã‚¢ã®æ–¹ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã¯å¸¸è­˜ãªã®ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ãŒâ€¦â€¦

Pythonã§PostgreSQLã‚’æ‰±ã†ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€psycopg2ã€

ã€€Pythonã§PostgreSQLã‚’æ‰±ã†éš›ã¯ã€psycopg2ã€ã¨ã„ã†ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã®ãŒä¸€èˆ¬çš„ãªã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚è¦–è¦šåŒ–ã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€Plotlyã€ã¨ä½µã›ã¦ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

(base) masaru@ASUS-TUF-Gaming:~$ conda install psycopg2
(base) masaru@ASUS-TUF-Gaming:~$ conda install plotly

Jupyter Notebookã§ã®å®Ÿè£…

ã€€å¿…è¦ãªãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ãªã©ã®åˆæœŸè¨­å®šã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import psycopg2
import pandas as pd
import plotly as py
import plotly.graph_objs as go
from plotly.offline import iplot, init_notebook_mode
init_notebook_mode()

ã€€psychopg2ã§ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹æ¥ç¶šã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

def connect():
    con = psycopg2.connect("host=" + "localhost" +
                           " port=" + "5432" +
                           " dbname=" + "google_mobility" +
                           " user=" + "masaru" +
                           " password=" + "xxxxxxxxxxxx")
    return con

ã€€ç¶šã„ã¦ã€ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

def select_execute(con, sql):
    with con.cursor() as cur:
        cur.execute(sql)
        rows = cur.fetchall()

    return rows

ã€€å®šç¾©ã—ãŸã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

con = connect()
sql =  "select * from google_mobility where SUB_REGION_1 = 'Tokyo'"
result = select_execute(con, sql)

ã€€ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªã®çµæœã‚’Pandasãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒ ã«ä»£å…¥ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

df = pd.DataFrame(result)
df.head()

ã€€ã¨ã‚Šã‚ãˆãšå…¨éƒ¨ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ åã‚’ã¤ã‘ã¦ã‚ã’ã¾ã™ã€‚

columns = ["id","country_region_code","country_region","sub_region_1","sub_region_2","metro_area","iso_3166_2_code","census_fips_code","date","retail","grocery","parks","transit","workplaces","residental","place_id"]
df.columns = columns
df.head()

ã€€Plotlyã§è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

trace1 = go.Scatter(
        x = list(df.date),
        y = list(df.retail),
        mode = 'lines+markers',
        name = 'retail',
        marker = dict(
                color = 'blue'
                )
        )

trace2 = go.Scatter(
        x = list(df.date),
        y = list(df.grocery),
        mode = 'lines+markers',
        name = 'grocery',
        marker = dict(
                color = 'orange'
                )
        )

data = [trace1, trace2]

ã€€ç¶šã„ã¦ã€Plotlyã®ç‰¹é•·ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

layout = dict(
    title='Time series with range slider and selectors',
    xaxis=dict(
        rangeselector=dict(
            buttons=list([
                dict(count=1,
                     label='1m',
                     step='month',
                     stepmode='backward'),
                dict(count=6,
                     label='6m',
                     step='month',
                     stepmode='backward'),
                dict(count=1,
                    label='YTD',
                    step='year',
                    stepmode='todate'),
                dict(count=1,
                    label='1y',
                    step='year',
                    stepmode='backward'),
                dict(step='all')
            ])
        ),
        rangeslider=dict(
            visible = True
        ),
        type='date'
    )
)

ã€€ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã‚’æç”»ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

fig = dict(data=data, layout=layout)
iplot(fig)

ã€€ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’å‹•ã‹ã›ã‚‹ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®å‡ºæ¥ä¸ŠãŒã‚Šã§ã™ã€‚

Ryzen+NVIDIAã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒæ¬²ã—ã„ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã¨æ©Ÿæ¢°å­¦ç¿’ã®å…¨éƒ¨å…¥ã‚Šãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒ³ã  ã€€å‰ã€…ã‹ã‚‰ã€å›³æ›¸é¤¨ãªã©ã§ã‚‚ã‚¬ãƒƒãƒ„ãƒªä½¿ã„å€’ã›ã‚‹Linuxãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒæ¬²ã—ã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚å…·ä½“çš„ã«ã¯ã€PostgreSQLãŒselectæ–‡… ç¶šãã‚’èª­ã‚€ Ubuntu 21.04ä½¿ç”¨é–‹å§‹(1æ—¥ç›®)

item.content:encoded:
Ryzen+NVIDIAã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒæ¬²ã—ã„ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã¨æ©Ÿæ¢°å­¦ç¿’ã®å…¨éƒ¨å…¥ã‚Šãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒ³ã 

ã€€å‰ã€…ã‹ã‚‰ã€å›³æ›¸é¤¨ãªã©ã§ã‚‚ã‚¬ãƒƒãƒ„ãƒªä½¿ã„å€’ã›ã‚‹Linuxãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒæ¬²ã—ã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚å…·ä½“çš„ã«ã¯ã€PostgreSQLãŒselectæ–‡ã§4ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ãã‚‰ã„ä¸¦åˆ—å‡¦ç†ã—ã¦ãã‚Œã¦ã€TensorFlow/Kerasã§GPU SUGEEEEå‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ç¨‹åº¦ã®ã‚¹ãƒšãƒƒã‚¯ã§ã™ã€‚

ã€€Amazonã®å¹´æœ«ã‚»ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ã€ASUS ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ‘ã‚½ã‚³ãƒ³ TUF Gaming A15 FA506IH (AMD Ryzen5 4600H/8GBãƒ»SSD 512GB/GTX 1650/1,920Ã—1,080ãƒ‰ãƒƒãƒˆ (ãƒ•ãƒ«HD) (144Hz)/15.6ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ/ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒ»ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¤)ã€ãŒï¿¥82,800ã¨å®‰ã‹ã£ãŸã®ã§è¡å‹•è²·ã„ã€‚ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªã¯å³32GBã«å¢—è¨­ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ã€€4600Hã¯6ã‚³ã‚¢12ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆPCå‘ã‘CPUã§ã€AMD Renoirã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚ºã®å»‰ä¾¡ç‰ˆã§ã™ã€‚ã€æœ€å¼·ã€ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€å®Ÿå£²10ä¸‡å††ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã§ã“ã®æ€§èƒ½ã¯é­…åŠ›çš„ã§ã™ã€‚SSDã¯å†…è”µã§åˆ¥é€”2TBãã‚‰ã„æ¬²ã—ã„ã§ã™ãŒã€é‡‘æ¬ ãªã®ã§è¿½ã„è©°ã¾ã£ã¦ã‹ã‚‰è€ƒãˆã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã€€ãªãŠç¾åœ¨ã®æœ€æ–°ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã¯ã€ŒRyzen PRO 5000ã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚º ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ« ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ãƒƒã‚µ(5850U/5650U/5450U)ã€ã€åŠã³ã€ŒRyzen 5000ã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚º ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ« ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ãƒƒã‚µ(5800U/5700U/5600U/5500U/5400U/5300U)ã€ã§7nmä¸–ä»£ã®ã¾ã¾ã§ã™ã€‚5nmã®Zen4ä¸–ä»£ã¯2022å¹´ã«ç™»å ´äºˆå®šã§ã™ã€‚

ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°PCã¸ã®Ubuntu 21.04ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«

ã€€Ubuntuã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒçµ‚ã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã€æ²¢å±±ã®æœ‰åã§æ¥½ã—ãã†ãªã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚’ãƒªã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ã€ŒSSDã®æ®‹ã‚ŠãŒ300GBãã‚‰ã„ã—ã‹ãªã„ã®ã«ç‰‡ã£ç«¯ã‹ã‚‰å…¥ã‚Œã¡ã‚ƒãƒ€ãƒ¡ãƒ€ã€ã¨æ€ã„ã¤ã¤ã‚‚å…¥ã‚Œã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã†ã¡ã¯ã¤ã„å…¥ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

æ—¥æœ¬èªãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€åã‚’è‹±èªåŒ–

ã€€lsãªã©ã§ãƒ‘ã‚¹æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€åãŒæ—¥æœ¬èªã ã¨IMEã®åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã‚„å…¥åŠ›ãŒé¢å€’ãªã®ã§ã€è‹±èªã«å¤‰ãˆã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

masaru@ASUS-TUF-Gaming:~$ LANG=C xdg-user-dirs-gtk-update

å°å…¥ç›´å¾Œã«å…¥ã‚ŒãŸã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒª

ã€€åˆå¿ƒè€…ã§ã‚‚å°å…¥ã«å›°ã‚‰ãªã•ãã†ãªã‚‚ã®ã¯åå‰ã ã‘â€¦â€¦ã€‚

NDIVIAãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã®åŸºæœ¬è¨­å®š

ã€€Ubuntu 21.04ã¯ã€ç´ ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã§NVIDIAã®ç‹¬è‡ªãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ãã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãƒãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ‹ãƒ³ã‚°ã®è¦³ç‚¹ã‹ã‚‰ç‹¬è‡ªãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ãŒè‰¯ã•ãã†ã§ã™ã€‚

masaru@ASUS-TUF-Gaming:~$ lspci | grep -i nvidia
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: NVIDIA Corporation TU117M (rev ff)
01:00.1 Audio device: NVIDIA Corporation Device 10fa (rev ff)

ã€€ç¶šã„ã¦ã€aptã®ãƒ¬ãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã«æœ€æ–°ã®ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãŒé™ã£ã¦ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«è¨­å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

masaru@ASUS-TUF-Gaming:~$ sudo add-apt-repository -y -n ppa:graphics-drivers/ppaPPA publishes dbgsym, you may need to include 'main/debug' component
Repository: 'deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/graphics-drivers/ppa/ubuntu/ hirsute main'
Description:
Fresh drivers from upstream, currently shipping Nvidia.

## Current Status

Current long-lived branch release: `nvidia-430` (430.40)
Dropped support for Fermi series (https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4656)

Old long-lived branch release: `nvidia-390` (390.129)

For GF1xx GPUs use `nvidia-390` (390.129)
For G8x, G9x and GT2xx GPUs use `nvidia-340` (340.107)
For NV4x and G7x GPUs use `nvidia-304` (304.137) End-Of-Life!

Support timeframes for Unix legacy GPU releases:
https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/3142

## What we're working on right now:

- Normal driver updates
- Help Wanted: Mesa Updates for Intel/AMD users, ping us if you want to help do this work, we're shorthanded.

## WARNINGS:

This PPA is currently in testing, you should be experienced with packaging before you dive in here:

Volunteers welcome!

### How you can help:

## Install PTS and benchmark your gear:

Â Â Â Â sudo apt-get install phoronix-test-suite

Run the benchmark:

Â Â Â Â phoronix-test-suite default-benchmark openarena xonotic tesseract gputest unigine-valley

and then say yes when it asks you to submit your results to openbechmarking.org. Then grab a cup of coffee, it takes a bit for the benchmarks to run. Depending on the version of Ubuntu you're using it might preferable for you to grabs PTS from upstream directly: http://www.phoronix-test-suite.com/?k=downloads

## Share your results with the community:

Post a link to your results (or any other feedback to): https://launchpad.net/~graphics-drivers-testers

Remember to rerun and resubmit the benchmarks after driver upgrades, this will allow us to gather a bunch of data on performance that we can share with everybody.

If you run into old documentation referring to other PPAs, you can help us by consolidating references to this PPA.

If someone wants to go ahead and start prototyping on `software-properties-gtk` on what the GUI should look like, please start hacking!

## Help us Help You!

We use the donation funds to get the developers hardware to test and upload these drivers, please consider donating to the "community" slider on the donation page if you're loving this PPA:

http://www.ubuntu.com/download/desktop/contribute
More info: https://launchpad.net/~graphics-drivers/+archive/ubuntu/ppa
Adding repository.
Adding deb entry to /etc/apt/sources.list.d/graphics-drivers-ubuntu-ppa-hirsute.list
Adding disabled deb-src entry to /etc/apt/sources.list.d/graphics-drivers-ubuntu-ppa-hirsute.list
